channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 74 lakh WhatsApp accounts banned in India
item.description: WhatsApp took action and banned 7,420,748 accounts in India from August 1 to August 31, in compliance with the new IT Rules of 2021.

item.title: B'luru provided enough content for Noah's shows: Mazumdar-Shaw
item.description: Biocon Chairperson Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw said that Bengaluru has provided enough content for the future shows of Trevor Noah.

item.title: Dunzo Co-founder Dalvir Suri quits amid cash crunch
item.description: Dunzo Co-founder Dalvir Suri is leaving the cash-strapped startup after over six years. His departure comes amid Dunzo's cash-flow crisis which forced the company to lay off hundreds of employees in several rounds.

item.title: House from 'Sex Education' goes on sale, pics released
item.description: The iconic house from Netflix show 'Sex Education' has been listed for sale for £1.5 million (over ₹15 crore). Located in England's Herefordshire, the five-bedroom chalet was built in 1912 as a salmon fishing lodge and is of Norwegian design. It has a custom-painted wood kitchen, a conservatory, a stone pizza oven, a summer house, and a Swedish hot bath.

item.title: I have lost my bronze medal to a transgender woman, help me: India's Swapna on Nandini
item.description: Indian heptathlete Swapna Barman speaks out against Nandini Agasara after losing bronze medal in women's heptathlon at 19th Asian Games

item.title: Most wanted terrorist Shahnawaz arrested in Delhi in ISIS case
item.description: Delhi Police Special Cell arrested NIA's most wanted terrorist Shahnawaz alias Shafi Uzzama. NIA had placed a reward of ₹3 lakh on the arrested terrorist Shahnawaz, who is wanted in the Pune ISIS case.

item.title: Nandini left Asian Games village after my complaint, who got her the tickets? asks Swapna
item.description: Swapna Barman, who finished fourth in the Asian Games, claimed that Nandini Agasara left the Asian Games village after her complaint. Swapna questioned who got Nandini the tickets to leave the village.

item.title: New Ring Road to Delhi airport will reduce travel time to 20 mins: Gadkari
item.description: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari announced that the Urban Extension Road-II, a key ring road project in Delhi, will open to commuters within the next two-three months. The Ring Road will reduce travel time to Delhi Airport from two hours to 20 minutes.

item.title: Pakistan cricketers go out for dinner in Hyderabad, click selfies with fans; video surfaces
item.description: Members of Pakistan's ODI World Cup 2023 squad were spotted enjoying dinner at 'Jewel of Nizam' restaurant in Hyderabad. Watch the video as players click selfies with fans and enjoy the hospitality.

item.title: Ravichandran Ashwin's 'duplicate' declines Australia's offer to assist them
item.description: Mahesh Pithiya, dubbed as Ravichandran Ashwin's duplicate, has declined Australia's offer to assist them in their preparations for the ODI World Cup 2023.

item.title: Sutirtha Mukherjee, Ayhika Mukherjee win India's 1st ever bronze in women's doubles TT at Asiad
item.description: Indian table tennis players Sutirtha Mukherjee and Ayhika Mukherjee on Monday won India's first-ever bronze medal in women's doubles table tennis event in the history of Asian Games.

item.title: Sutirtha Mukherjee, Ayhika Mukherjee win India's 1st ever bronze in women's doubles TT at Asiad
item.description: Indian table tennis players Sutirtha Mukherjee and Ayhika Mukherjee on Monday won India's first-ever bronze medal in women's doubles table tennis event in the history of Asian Games.

item.title: Top US govt official praises Jaishankar, calls him 'architect' of modern US-India ties
item.description: A top official of Joe Biden's administration in the US has praised External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, calling him 'incredibly talented' and an 'architect' of modern ties between the two nations.

item.title: Trudeau trying to crush free speech in Canada: Elon Musk
item.description: Elon Musk accuses Canadian PM Justin Trudeau of attempting to suppress free speech in Canada

item.title: Vithya becomes joint-fastest Indian woman to run 400m hurdles, equals PT Usha's record
item.description: Hurdler Vithya Ramraj has become the joint-fastest Indian woman to run 400m hurdles, equaling PT Usha's record. Read more to know about her achievement.

item.title: Woman passenger delays flight by 5 hrs after saying 'Do I have bomb' at Varanasi airport
item.description: An Akasa Air flight from Varanasi to Mumbai was delayed by five hours after a woman passenger's remark triggered a security scare. The woman, apparently annoyed by strict pre-boarding checks at the airport, said, 'Mere paas bomb hai kya (Do I have a bomb).' Following her remark, all passengers were deplaned and their bags were checked again thoroughly.
